mp4v2 library
-------------

   Origin: https://github.com/TechSmith/mp4v2
   Version: Repository State from 11 Mai 2017. Thats two checkins after v3.0.3.0

   That repository is a continuation of the orignal repository at
   https://code.google.com/archive/p/mp4v2/downloads
   which stopped development in 2012:
